title: Germany officially calls colonial-era killings in Namibia 'genocide'
content:
1. Germany officially calls colonial-era killings in Namibia 'genocide'  NBC News
  2. Germany will pay Namibia $1.3bn as it formally recognizes colonial-era genocide  CNN
  3. Germany officially recognizes colonial-era Namibia genocide | DW News  DW News
  4. Germany acknowledges colonial genocide in Namibia and promises development projects  The Washington Post
  5. Germany admits to genocide in Namibia during colonial rule  The National
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ドイツ、ナミビアでの植民地時代の殺害を「ジェノサイド」と公式に発表
德国正式称殖民时代在纳米比亚的杀戮为 "种族灭绝"。
德國正式稱殖民時代在納米比亞的殺戮爲 "種族滅絕"。
